formattedAddress: 232 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 232 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Doctor Teaiwa Rutherford is great! I’ve been going to her for quite a few years now. She is pleasant, friendly, knowledgeable and very thorough. If I leave a message for her, she is quick to respond and she remembers me and my history. I feel comfortable asking her questions and confident that I will get thoughtful, expert, well- thought out medical advice/direction. The staff in the office is very nice and her nurses are awesome! I followed her here from her last practice and I’m so happy I did.

originalText.text: Dr. Teaiwa is the best OBGYN out there.  She delivered my two daughters - now ages 6-years-old and 3-years-old.  Dr. T is kind, patient, supportive, expeditious, and an expert in her field.  She is everything you would want in a doctor and I cannot recommend her enough.

text.text: Dr. Teaiwa is the best OBGYN out there.  She delivered my two daughters - now ages 6-years-old and 3-years-old.  Dr. T is kind, patient, supportive, expeditious, and an expert in her field.  She is everything you would want in a doctor and I cannot recommend her enough.

originalText.text: Putting my trust, body and care into this doctor was truly the biggest mistake of my life. She does not believe in natural childbirth. She broke my water the second I got to the hospital even though I declined a cervical check upon arrival. She forced an epidural and Pitocin on me at a ridiculously early stage when my baby and I were happily laboring. She had a midwife with her telling me I looked EXHAUSTED and would have no energy to push if I didn’t take a nap. It simply wasn’t true. Dr. Teaiwa used coercion and manipulation to speed everything up leading to PTSD and a separation of mother and baby. I was having a beautifully blessed pregnancy and labor until I went into her care. But care is most definitely not a word that can be used. We were a number in her night. When I asked about Cornell’s 98% epidural rate and what I was missing, the answer was her. Because I certainly resisted and was happy without. She doesn’t believe in a woman’s choices or abilities. Which is a devastating mixture.

originalText.text: I love Dr. Teaiwa-Rutherford and this practice. This is a busy practice, but everyone is focused on giving stellar patient-driven care that is thorough, reassuring and kind. I am privileged to have known Dr. Teaiwa for 14 years and she delivered both of my children. I feel very fortunate and grateful to be a patient under her exemplary care.

originalText.text: I have loved my experience with Dr.Teaiwa-Rutherford! She is so kind and listens to all my concerns. Excited to continue working with her and her team!
